channel.title: Making your character Talk?
channel.description: I was wondering how could you make your player say something, without typing it in the chat? Like lets say I clicked on a door, and then my player would say "Door!" or something. How could I do this?

item.title: Making your character Talk?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Guys I’m not a freakin idiot.

I know just as much as some of you (in private server coding).

I thought it was txt4 after I posted it, but thanks for the help guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Making your character Talk?
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

lol well u should at least tel him were it EXACTLy goes lol

Its a STRING

txt4 = THE STRING;

Speak( int THE STRING);

speak(“text”);

THE STRING = text

txt4 = “text”;

Read full topic

@hippie wrote:

he can jus add it in his private voids, like i did wanted to see how well it works, and yeep

item.title: Making your character Talk?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Stanyer, post:10, topic:128544”][quote author=Goneby123 link=topic=179183.msg1638916#msg1638916 date=1185848293]

Stanyer, he sux

public void newbs() { if(Goneby123posts == true) { txt4 = "Goneby is t3h sux, no offense"; }
[/quote] i ment objects…u guys rely dont respect dumbasses… and btw maybe u should give him the thing he wants?

Its been given to him already…

But to make it easier add this void:

private void SpeakPls(String TheText){
txt4 = TheText;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}

and in cases or w/e you want:

SpeakPls(“Pmg i’n speaking”);

K?

i dont think that would work…he needs better help…explain it to him

Yes it would work…[/quote] lol well u should at least tel him were it EXACTLy goes lol

Read full topic
